price: ní àwọn ilẹ̀ tó wà nítòsí (erékùsù Lárúbáwá).¹ Lẹ́yìn ìṣẹ́gun wọn, àwọn náà máa ṣẹ́gun wọn
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ní ilẹ̀ Siria, ‘Irāƙ, Jọdan àti Palẹstin.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
